name: Cards of the Swords of Protection
text:
You can use any of the following effects once in a Duel.
● Send 1 "Swords of Revealing Light" from your field that has been activated during this turn to the Graveyard and draw 1 card.
● You can send 1 "Swords of Revealing Light" from your field to the Graveyard before your normal draw. Your normal draw from this turn will be 1 card that you have chosen from your Deck.
